column2: I had my mind set and was excited about the lamb chops
column4: the waiter told me that they didn't have any and were taking the lamb chops off the menu. A real letdown
column5: but I changed my order to the same as my boyfriend's
column6: a dry aged New York strip steak. Before the food came
column7: a server brought to us two massive slabs of their homemade sourdough bread and salted butter. Here is
column9: the test of a good steakhouse. The bread was incredibly soft and airy
column10: with a strong sour crust. The butter was immaculate -- the smoothest and creamiest we've ever tasted.
